resources.string: This app is for educational purposes to show how to request read/write permission at runtime and how to copy files from/to destination.
The button below will create both a folder called MyNewFolder on SD card and a file called sample.txt outside of this folder and move it into the folder.
To turn this into production code you should add some logic. For example, allow the user to choose which file to copy and also create the destination folder of their choosing.
